title: HOMESCAPES LUXURY SYNTHETIC HOLLOWFIBRE DUVET - 13.5 TOG - SINGLE SIZE - WASHABLE AT HOME
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS SOLD BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN THE FACTORY OF ONE OF THE LARGEST MANUFACTURERS OF NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS; ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.

title: HOMESCAPES LUXURY SYNTHETIC HOLLOWFIBRE DUVET - 10.5 TOG - DOUBLE SIZE - WASHABLE AT HOME
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS SOLD BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN THE FACTORY OF ONE OF THE LARGEST MANUFACTURERS OF NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS; ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.

title: LILYSILK MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASE FOR HAIR WITH COTTON UNDERSIDE CHARMEUSE HYPOALLERGENIC SET OF 2 PILLOW CASES STANDARD 50X75 CM PALE TURQUOISE
pd: LILYSILK NEW DESIGNED 19 MOMME SILK PILLOWCASE IS CRAFTED BY 100% PURE MULBERRY SILK FOR THE TOP SIDE. IT IS DESIGNED WITH A COTTON UNDERSIDE TO PREVENT SLIPPING.      DIFFERENCE BETWEEN TERSE PILLOWCASES & OXFORD PILLOWCASES    TERSE PILLOWCASES ARE DESIGNED WITH NO FLANGES. OXFORD PILLOWCASES ARE DESIGNED WITH FLANGES.      SILK FABRIC : 19 MOMME; 22 MOMME; 25 MOMME.   MOMMES (MM) IS A UNIT TRADITIONALLY USED TO MEASURE THE QUALITY OF SILK FABRICS. ONE MOMME = 4.340 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER; 8 MOMMES IS APPROXIMATELY 1 OUNCE PER SQUARE YARD OR 35 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER.     FOR BEDDING THE HIGHER THE WEIGHT IN MOMME THE BETTER THE SILK BEDDING IS. SHEETS BETWEEN 19-25 MOMME ARE CONSIDERED IDEAL SILK WITH MOMME WEIGHT. LOWER THAN 19 ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF QUALITY SILK BEDDING LINEN.      SILK BENEFITS :   1. TOTALLY CLEAN! - ALL OTHER TYPES OF BEDDING CONTAIN THOUSANDS OR EVEN MILLIONS OF DUST MITES MOULD FUNGUS AND OTHER MICROSCOPIC LIFE. THESE CANNOT LIVE IN SILK.   2. PROTECTS SKIN FROM FURTHER DAMAGE - A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH LEAVES A PROTECTIVE BARRIER ON SKIN HELPING PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE.   3. NOURISHES AND PROTECTS THE HAIR - IN THE SAME WAY THAT THE SKIN IS NOURISHED AND PROTECTED THE AMINO ACIDS AND THE PROTEIN SERICIN NOURISH AND PROTECT YOUR HAIR TOO.      CARE INSTRUCTION :   THE BEST WAY TO CARE FOR SILK IS SIMPLY AVOID CONTACT WITH CHEMICALS ESPECIALLY THOSE WITH STRONG BASIC/ACIDIC PROPERTIES SUCH AS BLEACH AND AVOID EXTREME TEMPERATURES ESPECIALLY HEAT.ALWAYS WASH YOUR LINEN IN LUKEWARM WATER AT APPROXIMATELY 30Â¡Ã£C. IF YOU USE A WASHING MACHINE MAKE SURE TO USE A SILK OR DELICATE SETTING WITH MINIMAL SPIN TIME.

title: FIRE RETARDANT QUILT/DUVET COVER (BS7-175 CRIB7)(CREAM SINGLE SIZE)
pd: FIRE RETARDANT BEDDING (CERTIFIED BS7-175 CRIB 7)     THE POLYESTER USED FOR THIS BEDDING IS INHERENTLY FIRE RETARDANT. IN OTHER WORDS IT REMAINS FIRE RETARDANT THROUGHOUT ITS LIFETIME. THE FIRE RETARDANT QUALITIES ARE NOT SPRAYED ON. THEY ARE BUILT INTO THE FABRIC DURING THE MANUFACTURING PROCESS - AND ARE PERMANENT. THIS IS WHY THEY ARE SO EXPENSIVE IN COMPARISON TO NON FIRE-RETARDANT BEDDING AND WHY THEY ARE USED IN INSTITUTIONS.   COTTON/POLY-COTTON AND SOME CHEAPER POLYESTER TYPES OF BEDDING ARE ONLY FIRE-RETARDANT ON A TEMPORARY BASIS THEY ARE SPRAYED TO MAKE THEM FIRE RETARDANT (FOR A SHORT WHILE). THE SPRAY WASHES OUT COMPLETELY IN 4-5 WASHES MAKING THEM NON FIRE RETARDANT AFTER A MATTER OF DAYS/WEEKS. 100% POLYESTER     QUILT / DUVET COVER SIZES (ALL SIZES)   STANDARD UK SIZES   SINGLE BED SIZE - 3 FOOT / 91CM X 198CM / 3  X 6 4    DOUBLE BED SIZE - 4 FOOT 6 INCH / 137CM X 198CM / 4 6  X 6 4    KING SIZE BED - 5 FOOT / 152CM X 198CM / 5  X 6 4      DEPTH - 7CM / 3  APPROXIMATE     ALL SIZES ARE APPROXIMATE. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS MANUFACTURED BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN ONE OF THE LARGEST FACTORY OF THE NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR THE LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK LIKE JOHN LEWIS OR HOUSE OF FRASER. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . title: HOMESCAPES LUXURY WHITE GOOSE FEATHER & DOWN DUVET 10.5 TOG SUPER KING SIZE 100% COTTON ANTI DUST MITE & DOWN PROOF FABRIC ANTI ALLERGEN BOX BAFFLE CONSTRUCTION WASHABLE AT HOME RANGE
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS AND ALSO THE QUALITY RETAILERS IN THE UK AND ELSEWHERE. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS MANUFACTURED BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN ONE OF THE LARGEST FACTORY OF THE NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR THE LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK LIKE JOHN LEWIS OR HOUSE OF FRASER. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICRO FIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.
bp: HOMESCAPES BRAND - 10.5 TOG SUPER KING BED SIZE (260X220CM) GOOSE FEATHER AND DOWN DUVET (15% WHITE GOOSE DOWN AND 85% WHITE GOOSE FEATHER);DOWN HOMESCAPES ONLY USE THE THREE DIMENSIONAL VERY SMALL FLUFFY DOWN THAT LIE UNDERNEATH THE OUTER CONTOUR FEATHERS ON A BIRD S BODY AND PROVIDE SUPPER SOFTNESS AND LOFT AND ARE CONSIDERED THE BEST AVAILABLE.;FEATHERS - HOMESCAPES ONLY USE SMALL CHEST FEATHERS (2CM TO 3CM) AS THESE ARE THE SOFTEST AND BEST AND NEVER THE MUCH CHEAPER MECHANICALLY BROKEN LARGE FLIGHT FEATHERS AS FOUND IN MANY CHEAPER DUVETS) THIS RESULTS IN A MUCH SUPERIOR LUXURIOUS AND SOFTER SLUMBER;OUTER CASING - 100% HIGH DENSITY COTTON ANTI DUST MITE DOWN PROOF FABRIC THAT PREVENTS FEATHERS COMING OUT THAT S BEEN CONTINENTAL QUILT STITCHED IN A BOX BAFFLE CONSTRUCTION WITH INTERNAL WALLS. THIS KEEPS THE FILLING IN ITS POSITION AND THE DUVET PROVIDES WARMTH ALL OVER WITH NO COLD SPOTS;GENUINE QUALITY - IN TRUE HOMESCAPES TRADITION ALL OUR DUVETS ARE MANUFACTURED TO THE BEST EUROPEAN STANDARDS IN AN ISO 9001 CERTIFIED FACTORY AND ARE AS SUPPLIED TO LARGE DEPARTMENT STORES AND HOTELS WORLDWIDE. WASHABLE AT HOME IN YOUR DOMESTIC WASHING MACHINE AND DELIVERED WITH ITS OWN ZIP UP BAG FOR CONVENIENT STORAGE.

title: MICROFIBRE LUXURY FEELS LIKE DOWN KING DUVET 13.5 TOG
pd:
MATERIAL: MICROFIBRE
FILLING: MICROFIBRE
TOG: 13.5
COLOUR: WHITE
PATTERN: SOLID
SIZE: KING

WHAT IS TOG?
DUVETS AND QUILTS WORK BY TRAPPING WARM AIR AND THE HIGHER THE TOG RATING THE MORE WARMTH THE DUVET WILL PROVIDE. THE TABLE BELOW WILL HELP YOU DECIDE WHICH TOG RATING IS RIGHT FOR YOU.
SEASON : TOG RATING

SUMMER : 4.5

SPRING : 10.5

AUTUMN : 13.5

WINTER : 15.0

ALL SEASONS : 4.5 + 9.0 OR 4.5 + 10.5

DUVET SIZE:

SINGLE : 135CM X 200CM (4FT 5" X 6FT 7")

DOUBLE : 200CM X 200CM (6FT 7" X 6FT 7")

KING : 230CM X 220CM (7FT 7" X 7FT 3")

SUPER KING : 260CM X 220CM (8FT 6" X 7FT 3")

WHAT IS MICROFIBRE?
MICROFIBRE IS A ULTRA FINE AND ULTRA SOFT FIBRE WHICH IS LIGHTWEIGHT BUT HAS HIGH THERMAL RETENTION PROPERTIES. OUR DUVETS USE PRIMALOFT MICROFIBRE WHICH WAS DEVELOPED FOR THE US ARMY AS AN ALTERNATIVE TO DOWN. THE ADVANTAGE FOR THE ARMY WAS THAT WHEN A SLEEPING BAG BECAME WET IT WOULD STILL RETAIN ITS INSULATING CAPABILITIES UNLIKE DOWN OR HOLLOW-FIBRE. NOWADAY S DUE ITS SOFT FLUFFY VELVETY TEXTURE IT IS USED IN BEDDING. THE FILLING COMPROMISES OF 100% MICROFIBRE.THE MICROFIBRE CONTENT PROVIDES HIGH LOFT EXTRA SOFTNESS AND TRAPS WARM AIR EFFICIENTLY. THIS GIVES THE DUVET A REALLY SUMPTUOUS COZY FEEL AS IT DRAPES SOFTLY OVER THE BODY.

EASY CARE FULLY WASHABLE
QUALITY 100% MICROFIBRE COVER
BRAND NEW AND SEALED IN A PRESENTATION BAG
MANUFACTURED WITH CARE
DESIGNED TO DRAPE COMFORTABLY AND SOFTLY AROUND THE BODY

title: HOMESCAPES LUXURY SYNTHETIC HOLLOWFIBRE DUVET - 13.5 TOG - SINGLE SIZE - WASHABLE AT HOME
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS AND ALSO THE QUALITY RETAILERS IN THE UK AND ELSEWHERE. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS MANUFACTURED BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN ONE OF THE LARGEST FACTORY OF THE NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR THE LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK LIKE JOHN LEWIS OR HOUSE OF FRASER. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE. BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICRO FIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.

title: LILYSILK HOUSEWIFE SILK PILLOWCASE PILLOW COVER FOR HAIR AND SKIN BOTH SIDES 1PC 19 MOMME MULBERRY SILK CHARMEUSE STANDARD 50X75 CM BLACK
pd: LILYSILK S 19 MOMME PILLOWCASE IS THE PERFECT CHOICE TO ENTER THE WORLD OF SILK.INEXPENSIVE YET EFFECTIVE IN TREATING COMMON SLEEP-RELATED FACIAL/HAIR PROBLEMS.     SILK FABRIC : 19 MOMME; 22 MOMME; 25 MOMME.   MOMMES (MM) IS A UNIT TRADITIONALLY USED TO MEASURE THE QUALITY OF SILK FABRICS. ONE MOMME = 4.340 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER; 8 MOMMES IS APPROXIMATELY 1 OUNCE PER SQUARE YARD OR 35 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER.     FOR BEDDING THE HIGHER THE WEIGHT IN MOMME THE BETTER THE SILK BEDDING IS. SHEETS BETWEEN 19-25 MOMME ARE CONSIDERED IDEAL SILK WITH MOMME WEIGHT. LOWER THAN 19 ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF QUALITY SILK BEDDING LINEN.      SILK BENEFITS :   1. TOTALLY CLEAN! - ALL OTHER TYPES OF BEDDING CONTAIN THOUSANDS OR EVEN MILLIONS OF DUST MITES MOULD FUNGUS AND OTHER MICROSCOPIC LIFE. THESE CANNOT LIVE IN SILK.   2. PROTECTS SKIN FROM FURTHER DAMAGE - A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH LEAVES A PROTECTIVE BARRIER ON SKIN HELPING PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE.   3. NOURISHES AND PROTECTS THE HAIR - IN THE SAME WAY THAT THE SKIN IS NOURISHED AND PROTECTED THE AMINO ACIDS AND THE PROTEIN SERICIN NOURISH AND PROTECT YOUR HAIR TOO.      CARE INSTRUCTION :   THE BEST WAY TO CARE FOR SILK IS SIMPLY AVOID CONTACT WITH CHEMICALS ESPECIALLY THOSE WITH STRONG BASIC/ACIDIC PROPERTIES SUCH AS BLEACH AND AVOID EXTREME TEMPERATURES ESPECIALLY HEAT.ALWAYS WASH YOUR LINEN IN LUKEWARM WATER AT APPROXIMATELY 30 DEGREES CELSIUS. IF YOU USE A WASHING MACHINE MAKE SURE TO USE A SILK OR DELICATE SETTING WITH MINIMAL SPIN TIME.

pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS AND ALSO THE QUALITY RETAILERS IN THE UK AND ELSEWHERE. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS MANUFACTURED BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN ONE OF THE LARGEST FACTORY OF THE NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR THE LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK LIKE JOHN LEWIS OR HOUSE OF FRASER. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE. BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICRO FIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.

pd: 1. FEWER WRINKLES:     MULBERRY SILK IS HYPOALLERGENIC AND CAN HELP SKIN MAINTAIN MOISTURE IT NEVER ABSORB FACIAL CREAMS AND IT IS SUPER SMOOTH AND SOFT TO PREVENT WRINKLES.      2. PREVENT HAIR LOSS:     MULBERRY SILK FIBERS STRUCTURE IS VERY SIMILAR TO HUMAN HAIR SO THAT IT ALLOWS HAIR TO SLIDE GENTLY ACROSS THE PILLOWCASE TO PREVENT HAIR LOSS.      3. LONGER-LASTING HAIRSTYLE:    MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASES ARE SUPER SOFT AND SMOOTH THEY CAN LONGER LASTING BLOW DRIES BEST FOR THOSE WHO HAVE LONG HAIR.      4.PROMOTE HEALTH & GREAT SLEEP:     MULBERRY SILK HAS 18 TYPES OF NATURALLY OCCURRING COMPOUNDS THAT ARE BELIEVED TO PROMOTE POSITIVE HEALTH CARE FUNCTIONS. SILK IS A NATURAL BODY TEMPERATURE REGULATOR. THAT S WHY SILK IS MUCH BETTER THAN SATIN.        SILK CARE     1.COOL WASH     ALWAYS WASH YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE IN WARM NOT HOT WATER SETTING MACHINE WASHES AT 30 DEGREES OR ON A SILK SETTING.      2.USE OF PROTECTIVE BAGS    IF MACHINE WASHING TRY TO PLACE THE ITEM IN A PROTECTIVE BAG TO PREVENT THE PULLING ACTION OF YOUR WASHING MACHINE.      3.DRYING     HANGING YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE ON A WASHING LINE IS PREFERABLE TO MACHINE DRYING AWAY FROM DIRECT SUNLIGHT AND RADIATORS. WE RECOMMEND NOT TUMBLING DRY.      4.IRONING     TRY TO IRON YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE WHEN SLIGHTLY DAMP AND USE A COOL SETTING. YOUR ITEM SHOULD BE IRONED ON THE INSIDE AT ALL TIMES.      5.NEVER BLEACH     OR USE ANY KIND OF BLEACHING AGENT. BLEACH DAMAGES THE SILK FIBER AND WILL DESTROY SILK PILLOWCASE.      6.NEVER SHAMPOO     DO NOT ATTEMPT TO SUBSTITUTE A WASHING AGENT FOR SHAMPOO.     .

title: OOSILK 100% MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASE FOR HAIR AND SKIN 1PC KING 50X90CM VIOLET
pd: 1. FEWER WRINKLES:     MULBERRY SILK IS HYPOALLERGENIC AND CAN HELP SKIN MAINTAIN MOISTURE IT NEVER ABSORB FACIAL CREAMS AND IT IS SUPER SMOOTH AND SOFT TO PREVENT WRINKLES.      2. PREVENT HAIR LOSS:     MULBERRY SILK FIBERS STRUCTURE IS VERY SIMILAR TO HUMAN HAIR SO THAT IT ALLOWS HAIR TO SLIDE GENTLY ACROSS THE PILLOWCASE TO PREVENT HAIR LOSS.      3. LONGER-LASTING HAIRSTYLE:    MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASES ARE SUPER SOFT AND SMOOTH THEY CAN LONGER LASTING BLOW DRIES BEST FOR THOSE WHO HAVE LONG HAIR.      4.PROMOTE HEALTH & GREAT SLEEP:     MULBERRY SILK HAS 18 TYPES OF NATURALLY OCCURRING COMPOUNDS THAT ARE BELIEVED TO PROMOTE POSITIVE HEALTH CARE FUNCTIONS. SILK IS A NATURAL BODY TEMPERATURE REGULATOR. THAT S WHY SILK IS MUCH BETTER THAN SATIN.        SILK CARE     1.COOL WASH     ALWAYS WASH YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE IN WARM NOT HOT WATER SETTING MACHINE WASHES AT 30 DEGREES OR ON A SILK SETTING.      2.USE OF PROTECTIVE BAGS    IF MACHINE WASHING TRY TO PLACE THE ITEM IN A PROTECTIVE BAG TO PREVENT THE PULLING ACTION OF YOUR WASHING MACHINE.      3.DRYING     HANGING YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE ON A WASHING LINE IS PREFERABLE TO MACHINE DRYING AWAY FROM DIRECT SUNLIGHT AND RADIATORS. WE RECOMMEND NOT TUMBLING DRY.      4.IRONING     TRY TO IRON YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE WHEN SLIGHTLY DAMP AND USE A COOL SETTING. YOUR ITEM SHOULD BE IRONED ON THE INSIDE AT ALL TIMES.      5.NEVER BLEACH     OR USE ANY KIND OF BLEACHING AGENT. BLEACH DAMAGES THE SILK FIBER AND WILL DESTROY SILK PILLOWCASE.      6.NEVER SHAMPOO     DO NOT ATTEMPT TO SUBSTITUTE A WASHING AGENT FOR SHAMPOO.     .

title: HOMESCAPES - LUXURY WHITE GOOSE FEATHER & DOWN DUVET - 4.5 TOG - SINGLE SIZE - 100% COTTON ANTI DUST MITE & DOWN PROOF FABRIC - ANTI ALLERGEN - BOX BAFFLE CONSTRUCTION - WASHABLE AT HOME RANGE
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS SOLD BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN THE FACTORY OF ONE OF THE LARGEST MANUFACTURERS OF NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS; ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.
bp: HOMESCAPES BRAND - 4.5 TOG SINGLE BED SIZE (135 X 200CM) GOOSE FEATHER AND DOWN DUVET (15% WHITE GOOSE DOWN AND 85% WHITE GOOSE FEATHER);DOWN - HOMESCAPES ONLY USE THE THREE DIMENSIONAL VERY SMALL FLUFFY DOWN THAT LIE UNDERNEATH THE OUTER CONTOUR FEATHERS ON A BIRD S BODY AND PROVIDE SUPPER SOFTNESS AND LOFT AND ARE CONSIDERED THE BEST AVAILABLE.;FEATHERS - HOMESCAPES ONLY USE SMALL CHEST FEATHERS (2CM TO 3CM) AS THESE ARE THE SOFTEST AND BEST AND NEVER THE MUCH CHEAPER MECHANICALLY BROKEN LARGE FLIGHT FEATHERS AS FOUND IN MANY CHEAPER DUVETS) THIS RESULTS IN A MUCH SUPERIOR LUXURIOUS AND SOFTER SLUMBER.;OUTER CASING - 100% HIGH DENSITY COTTON ANTI DUST MITE DOWN PROOF FABRIC THAT PREVENTS FEATHERS COMING OUT THAT S BEEN CONTINENTAL QUILT STITCHED IN A BOX BAFFLE CONSTRUCTION WITH INTERNAL WALLS. THIS KEEPS THE FILLING IN ITS POSITION AND THE DUVET PROVIDES WARMTH ALL OVER WITH NO COLD SPOTS;GENUINE QUALITY - IN TRUE HOMESCAPES TRADITION ALL OUR DUVETS ARE MANUFACTURED TO THE BEST EUROPEAN STANDARDS IN AN ISO 9001 CERTIFIED FACTORY AND ARE AS SUPPLIED TO LARGE DEPARTMENT STORES AND HOTELS WORLDWIDE. WASHABLE AT HOME IN YOUR DOMESTIC WASHING MACHINE AND DELIVERED WITH ITS OWN ZIP UP BAG FOR CONVENIENT STORAGE.

title: OOSILK 100% MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASE FOR HAIR AND SKIN 1PC STANDARD 50X75CM PALE TURQUOISE
pd: 1. FEWER WRINKLES:     MULBERRY SILK IS HYPOALLERGENIC AND CAN HELP SKIN MAINTAIN MOISTURE IT NEVER ABSORB FACIAL CREAMS AND IT IS SUPER SMOOTH AND SOFT TO PREVENT WRINKLES.      2. PREVENT HAIR LOSS:     MULBERRY SILK FIBERS STRUCTURE IS VERY SIMILAR TO HUMAN HAIR SO THAT IT ALLOWS HAIR TO SLIDE GENTLY ACROSS THE PILLOWCASE TO PREVENT HAIR LOSS.      3. LONGER-LASTING HAIRSTYLE:    MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASES ARE SUPER SOFT AND SMOOTH THEY CAN LONGER LASTING BLOW DRIES BEST FOR THOSE WHO HAVE LONG HAIR.      4.PROMOTE HEALTH & GREAT SLEEP:     MULBERRY SILK HAS 18 TYPES OF NATURALLY OCCURRING COMPOUNDS THAT ARE BELIEVED TO PROMOTE POSITIVE HEALTH CARE FUNCTIONS. SILK IS A NATURAL BODY TEMPERATURE REGULATOR. THAT S WHY SILK IS MUCH BETTER THAN SATIN.        SILK CARE     1.COOL WASH     ALWAYS WASH YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE IN WARM NOT HOT WATER SETTING MACHINE WASHES AT 30 DEGREES OR ON A SILK SETTING.      2.USE OF PROTECTIVE BAGS    IF MACHINE WASHING TRY TO PLACE THE ITEM IN A PROTECTIVE BAG TO PREVENT THE PULLING ACTION OF YOUR WASHING MACHINE.      3.DRYING     HANGING YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE ON A WASHING LINE IS PREFERABLE TO MACHINE DRYING AWAY FROM DIRECT SUNLIGHT AND RADIATORS. WE RECOMMEND NOT TUMBLING DRY.      4.IRONING     TRY TO IRON YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE WHEN SLIGHTLY DAMP AND USE A COOL SETTING. YOUR ITEM SHOULD BE IRONED ON THE INSIDE AT ALL TIMES.      5.NEVER BLEACH     OR USE ANY KIND OF BLEACHING AGENT. BLEACH DAMAGES THE SILK FIBER AND WILL DESTROY SILK PILLOWCASE.      6.NEVER SHAMPOO     DO NOT ATTEMPT TO SUBSTITUTE A WASHING AGENT FOR SHAMPOO.     .

title: HOMESCAPES LUXURY SYNTHETIC HOLLOWFIBRE DUVET - 15 TOG - DOUBLE SIZE - WASHABLE AT HOME
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS AND ALSO THE QUALITY RETAILERS IN THE UK AND ELSEWHERE. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS MANUFACTURED BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN ONE OF THE LARGEST FACTORY OF THE NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR THE LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK LIKE JOHN LEWIS OR HOUSE OF FRASER. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE. BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICRO FIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.

title: MICROFIBRE LUXURY FEELS LIKE DOWN KING DUVET 13.5 TOG
pd: MATERIAL:  MICROFIBRE    FILLING: MICROFIBRE    TOG:  13.5    COLOUR:  WHITE    PATTERN:  SOLID    SIZE:  KING      WHAT IS TOG?     DUVETS AND QUILTS WORK BY TRAPPING WARM AIR AND THE HIGHER THE TOG RATING THE MORE WARMTH THE DUVET WILL PROVIDE. THE TABLE BELOW WILL HELP YOU DECIDE WHICH TOG RATING IS RIGHT FOR YOU.      SEASON : TOG RATING     SUMMER :  4.5    SPRING :  10.5    AUTUMN :  13.5    WINTER :  15.0    ALL SEASONS :  4.5 + 9.0 OR 4.5 + 10.5       DUVET SIZE:      SINGLE :  135CM X 200CM (4FT 5  X 6FT 7 )    DOUBLE :  200CM X 200CM (6FT 7  X 6FT 7 )    KING :  230CM X 220CM (7FT 7  X 7FT 3 )    SUPER KING :  260CM X 220CM (8FT 6  X 7FT 3 )       WHAT IS MICROFIBRE?     MICROFIBRE IS A ULTRA FINE AND ULTRA SOFT FIBRE WHICH IS LIGHTWEIGHT BUT HAS HIGH THERMAL RETENTION PROPERTIES. OUR DUVETS USE PRIMALOFT MICROFIBRE WHICH WAS DEVELOPED FOR THE US ARMY AS AN ALTERNATIVE TO DOWN. THE ADVANTAGE FOR THE ARMY WAS THAT WHEN A SLEEPING BAG BECAME WET IT WOULD STILL RETAIN ITS INSULATING CAPABILITIES UNLIKE DOWN OR HOLLOW-FIBRE. NOWADAY S DUE ITS SOFT FLUFFY VELVETY TEXTURE IT IS USED IN BEDDING.   THE FILLING COMPROMISES OF 100% MICROFIBRE.THE MICROFIBRE CONTENT PROVIDES HIGH LOFT EXTRA SOFTNESS AND TRAPS WARM AIR EFFICIENTLY. THIS GIVES THE DUVET A REALLY SUMPTUOUS COZY FEEL AS IT DRAPES SOFTLY OVER THE BODY.       EASY CARE FULLY WASHABLE     QUALITY 100% MICROFIBRE COVER     BRAND NEW AND SEALED IN A PRESENTATION BAG     MANUFACTURED WITH CARE     DESIGNED TO DRAPE COMFORTABLY AND SOFTLY AROUND THE BODY

title: LUXURY HUNGARIAN WHITE GOOSE DOWN SUPER KING BED SIZE 4.5 TOG DUVET BY VICEROYBEDDING

THESE NATURAL BREEDING CONDITIONS ALLOW THE GOOSE TO DEVELOP FULLY PRODUCING LARGE SOFT AND LIGHT DOWN. THESE DUVETS ARE STITCHED WITH A BAFFLE BOX CONSTRUCTION. SQUARE BOXES ARE SEPARATED BY A SERIES OF 1  INTERNAL FABRIC WALLS. THESE WALLS PERMIT THE DUVET TO EXPAND SO THAT THE DOWN CAN REACH ITS MAXIMUM LOFT ALLOWING EVEN DISTRIBUTION WHILE STILL HOLDING THE DOWN SECURELY IN PLACE. EACH BOX IS INDIVIDUALLY FILLED WITH THE EXACT AMOUNT OF DOWN REQUIRED AND FINISHED WITH DOUBLE STITCHING AND PIPED EDGING. THE FILLING IS 100% HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN. THE CASING IS A LOVELY JACQUARD 100% EGYPTIAN COTTON. WITH A 330 HIGH THREAD COUNT FOR SUPERIOR STRENGTH AND A SOFT DELICATE FINISH IT IS CUSTOM MADE FOR PURE DOWN. THESE HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN DUVETS OFFER COSY AND ABSOLUTELY SUPERB SLEEPING COMFORT FOR THOSE WHO VALUE A GOOD SLEEP.

title: HOMESCAPES - ULTRASOFT SUPER MICROFIBRE - 13.5 TOG - DOUBLE SIZE - THE BEST SYNTHETIC DUVETS DESIGNED FOR AND USED BY THE BEST 5 AND 7 STAR HOTELS FROM AROUND THE WORLD - ANTI ALLERGY - ANTI DUSTMITE - BOX BAFFEL CONSTRUCTION - WASHABLE AT HOME
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS SOLD BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN THE FACTORY OF ONE OF THE LARGEST MANUFACTURERS OF NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS; ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.
bp: ULTRASOFT SUPER MICROFIBRE 13.5 TOG . THIS DUVET IS NOT MADE FROM THE MUCH CHEAPER HOLLOW FIBRE FOUND IN MOST SYNTHETIC DUVETS;HOMESCAPES ULTRASOFT SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS ARE STITCHED USING BOX BAFFLE CONSTRUCTION WHICH ENSURES AN EVEN SPREAD OF FILLING AND PREVENTS CLUMPING AND COLD SPOTS THROUGHOUT THE LIFE OF THE DUVET. THE EDGES ARE ALSO DOUBLE STITCHED TO ENSURE THAT NONE OF THE FILLING IS ABLE TO ESCAPE.;HOMESCAPES ULTRASOFT SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS WERE ORIGINALLY DESIGNED AS A REPLACEMENT FOR 100% DOWN DUVETS AS USED BY 5 STAR HOTELS. THE END RESULT IS A DUVET THAT IS SUPER LIGHT EXTREMELY SOFT TO TOUCH AND VERY CUDDLY.;HOMESCAPES KEEP THE MANUFACTURING PROCESS A CLOSELY GUARDED SECRET AND DO NOT SUPPLY THIS QUALITY TO ANY OTHER RETAILER IN THE UK.;THE HIGH DENSITY ANTI DUST MITE ULTRASOFT MICROFIBRE COVER PROVIDES EXCELLENT PROTECTION FOR ANYBODY WHO SUFFERS WITH DUST ALLERGIES OR ASTHMA. title: ROMA DUCK FEATHER AND DOWN DUVETS 10.5 TOG (KING)
pd: ROMA DUVETS ARE MADE TO BRITISH STANDARDS FOR GURANTEED WARMTH AND CLEANLINESS WARMTH CLASSIFICATIONS 4.5 TOG 7.5 TOG 10.5 TOG 12 TOG 13.5 TOG 15 TOG SUMMER USE 4.5 TOG SPRING USE 10.5 TOG AUTUMN 10.5 TOG WINTER 13.5 TOG OR 15.0 TOG SHOULD I BUY MAN-MADE FIBRES OR NATURAL FILLINGS ? THIS IS A MATTER OF PERSONAL PREFERENCE; MAN-MADE CONTINENTAL QUILTS HAVE CERTAIN ADVANTAGES OVER NATURAL FILLED PRODUCTS. THEY ARE GENERALLY LESS EXPENSIVE SO MORE PEOPLE CAN ENJOY THE LUXURY OF A CONTINENTAL QUILT AT AFFORDABLE PRICES. THEY ARE ODOURLESS NON-ALLERGENIC AND ARE DUST FREE. CONTINENTAL QUILTS WITH MAN-MADE FILLINGS ARE EASY TO CARE FOR AND TO WASH. AS WITH MOST THINGS THE BETTER THE QUALITY OF MAN-MADE FILLING THE BETTER THE OVERALL PERFORMANCE OF THE QUILT. MOST MAN-MADE FILLINGS ARE MADE FROM POLYESTER FIBRES AND CAN BE SOLID OR HOLLOW WHICH TRAPS EVEN MORE AIR WITHIN AND BETWEEN EACH FIBRE. NATURAL QUILTS ARE IN GENERAL MORE COMFORTABLE AND WARMER THAN MAN-MADE QUILTS. THEY WILL DRAPE AROUND THE BODY AND BREATHE AS ONLY A NATURAL PRODUCT CAN. A COMFORTABLE SLEEPER WILL PERSPIRE AROUND ONE-THIRD TO ONE PINT OF MOISTURE A NIGHT. TO MAINTAIN DRY AND COMFORTABLE WARMTH THIS MOISTURE MUST BE TRANSPORTED AWAY FROM THE BODY. NATURAL FILLINGS ARE MORE ABSORBENT THAN MAN-MADE FILLINGS. THEY ACTUALLY ABSORB AND TRANSPORT MOISTURE THEREBY LOWERING THE HUMIDITY OF THE AIR IN THE QUILT. ONCE ABSORBED THE MOISTURE SLOWLY EVAPORATES SO COLDNESS IS NOT EXPERIENCED

title: LILYSILK 100 PURE MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASE COVER FOR HAIR WITH COTTON UNDERSIDE CHARMEUSE HYPOALLERGENIC 1PC WHITE STANDARD 80X80 CM 19 MOMME GIFT BOX
pd: LILYSILK NEW DESIGNED 19 MOMME SILK PILLOWCASE IS CRAFTED BY 100% PURE MULBERRY SILK FOR THE TOP SIDE. IT IS DESIGNED WITH A COTTON UNDERSIDE TO PREVENT SLIPPING.      SILK FABRIC : 19 MOMME; 22 MOMME; 25 MOMME.   MOMMES (MM) IS A UNIT TRADITIONALLY USED TO MEASURE THE QUALITY OF SILK FABRICS. ONE MOMME = 4.340 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER; 8 MOMMES IS APPROXIMATELY 1 OUNCE PER SQUARE YARD OR 35 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER.     FOR BEDDING THE HIGHER THE WEIGHT IN MOMME THE BETTER THE SILK BEDDING IS. SHEETS BETWEEN 19-25 MOMME ARE CONSIDERED IDEAL SILK WITH MOMME WEIGHT. LOWER THAN 19 ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF QUALITY SILK BEDDING LINEN.      SILK BENEFITS :   1. TOTALLY CLEAN! - ALL OTHER TYPES OF BEDDING CONTAIN THOUSANDS OR EVEN MILLIONS OF DUST MITES MOULD FUNGUS AND OTHER MICROSCOPIC LIFE. THESE CANNOT LIVE IN SILK.   2. PROTECTS SKIN FROM FURTHER DAMAGE - A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH LEAVES A PROTECTIVE BARRIER ON SKIN HELPING PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE.   3. NOURISHES AND PROTECTS THE HAIR - IN THE SAME WAY THAT THE SKIN IS NOURISHED AND PROTECTED THE AMINO ACIDS AND THE PROTEIN SERICIN NOURISH AND PROTECT YOUR HAIR TOO.      CARE INSTRUCTION :    *HAND WASH RECOMMENDED FIRSTLY.   *MACHINE WASH COLD GENTLE CYCLE. DO NOT BLEACH.  *USE NEUTRAL OR SPECIAL DETERGENT FOR SILK     DIFFERENCE BETWEEN SILK AND SATIN  1. SILK IS A TYPE OF FABRIC WHILE SATIN IS A WEAVE LOW PRICES SATIN ARE *NOT* MADE WITH SILK BUT WITH POLYESTER INSTEAD. A POLYESTER SATIN PILLOWCASE COSTS ROUGHLY 1/4 TO 1/2 OF A SILK PILLOWCASE OF THE SAME SIZE  2. SILK IS A NATURALLY MADE ANIMAL PROTEIN FIBER WHEREAS POLYESTER IS A INDUSTRIALLY PRODUCED FIBER MADE FROM PETROLEUM  3. SILK OFFERS SIGNIFICANTLY BETTER AFFINITY TO SKIN DUE TO SIMILAR CHEMICAL COMPOSITION. COMPARED TO SILK S SMOOTH AND LIGHT FEEL ON THE SKIN POLYESTER IS HARD BRITTLE AND NOT VERY BREATHING AT ALL
bp: THE PILLOWCASE ONE SIDE WITH 100% 19 MOMME MULBERRY SILK A SENSUOUSLY SMOOTH HYPOALLERGENIC AND BREATHABLE NATURAL ORGANIC FIBER; ANOTHER SIDE IS 100% COTTON TO PREVENT SLIPPING;ANTI-AGEING & HAIR FRIZZ - SUPERB ANTI WRINKLE SKIN CARE PRODUCT WHICH STOP YOUR FACE AND HAIR FROM DRYING OUT.;HIDDEN ZIPPER CLOSURE AT THE SIDE TO PREVENT SLIPPING. AND FOR STYLE COMFORT AND BETTER FIT.;OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 CERTIFIED TO BE FREE OF CHEMICALS AND NATURALLY DYED WITH NO COLOR SHADING OR FADING.;EASY CARE:HAND OR MACHINE WASH IN COLD WATER ON GENTLE CYCLE. HANG TO DRY. COOL IRON. DO NOT BLEACH. CAN ALSO BE DRY CLEANED

title: 100% HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN DUVET - SUPERKING - ALL SEASON
pd: WHY CHOOSE HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN?      THE CLUSTERS OF DOWN FROM HUNGARIAN GEESE HAVE LONGER FILAMENTS MAKING EACH CLUSTER GREATER IN VOLUME THAN THE DOWN FROM OTHER GEESE.  WE THEREFORE NEED LESS DOWN TO GET THE SAME WARMTH RETENTION IN THE DUVET RESULTING IN THE HUNGARIAN DUVETS BEING LIGHTER.  ADDITIONALLY THE QUALITY OF THE DOWN IS BETTER ENSURING THE DUVET REMAINS PLUMP AND FILLED FOR LONGER.        CONSTRUCTION:      THESE DUVETS ARE STITCHED WITH A BAFFLE BOX CONSTRUCTION. SQUARE BOXES ARE SEPARATED BY A SERIES OF 1  INTERNAL FABRIC WALLS.  THESE WALLS PERMIT THE DUVET TO EXPAND SO THAT THE DOWN CAN REACH ITS MAXIMUM LOFT ALLOWING EVEN DISTRIBUTION WHILE STILL HOLDING THE DOWN SECURELY IN PLACE.  EACH BOX IS INDIVIDUALLY FILLED WITH THE EXACT AMOUNT OF DOWN REQUIRED AND FINISHED WITH DOUBLE STITCHING AND PIPED EDGING.     THE FILLING IS 100% HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN. THE CASING IS A LOVELY JAQUARD 100% COTTON.  WITH A 300 HIGH THREAD COUNT FOR SUPERIOR STRENGTH AND A SOFT DELICATE FINISH IT IS CUSTOM MADE FOR PURE DOWN.      ALL SEASONS ARE 9+4.5 TOG THAT FASTEN TOGETHER (BUTTON) TO FORM ONE WINTER DUVET OR CAN BE SEPARATED AND USED INDIVIDUALLY.      100 % HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN   600 FILL POWER   1   INCH INTERNAL FABRIC WALLS   CASING JAQUARD 100% COTTON   BAFFLE BOX CONSTRUCTION   MACHINE WASHABLE   15 YEAR GUARANTEE   CERTIFIED BY OEKO-TEX 100   DOUBLE STITCHING AND PIPING   COMES WITH A LOVELY RE-USABLE BAG
bp: 100 % HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN;600 FILL POWER;BAFFLE BOX CONSTRUCTION;1   INCH INTERNAL FABRIC WALLS;CASING JAQUARD 100% COTTON

title: WHICH? TOP RATED DUVET BRAND 2015 | SNOW WHITE GOOSE DOWN DUVET - 4.5 TOG - SUMMER | SOAK&SLEEP (DOUBLE)
pd: WHY WE LOVE IT IN THE INDUSTRY PURE WHITE GOOSE DOWN CONTAINS LESS THAN 1% DARK DOWN. OUR SNOW WHITE GOOSE DOWN CONTAINS LESS THAN 0.5% - BECAUSE WE LIKE TO OUTDO OUR COMPETITORS. JUST A LITTLE BIT BETTER EVERY TIME... 80% DOWN 240TC DOWNPROOF CASING HOW DOES IT MAKE YOU FEEL? SNOW WHITE GOOSE DOWN MAKES THIS DUVET FEEL SOFT AND PUFFY - LIKE A HUGE MARSHMALLOW. THE NATURAL FILLING WILL DRAW AWAY HEAT AND MOISTURE FROM YOUR BODY AS YOU SLEEP SO YOU LL WAKE FEELING FRESH AS A DAISY. IT S A LITTLE HEAVIER THAN HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN BUT WHITE GOOSE DOWN IS A PREMIUM FILLING THAT S USED ALL OVER THE WORLD. OURS IS TOP GRADE - IN FACT IT S JUST A LITTLE TOO LIGHT - SO IT S NECESSARY TO USE 20% GOOSE FEATHER. WOULDN T WANT THAT DUVET FLOATING OFF INTO SPACE EH? FEATHER & DOWN DUVETS: OUR RULES THERE ARE SOME THINGS THAT WE JUST WON T COMPROMISE ON - NOT NOW NOT EVER. ATTENTION TO DETAIL IS OUR TRADEMARK. THE FEATHER & DOWN IS HYGIENICALLY TREATED BEFORE BEING COVERED IN A 100% COTTON CASE THEN BOX STITCHED WHICH ENSURES THAT THE FILLING REMAINS EVENLY SPREAD. THESE NATURALLY BREATHABLE DUVETS ARE CERTIFIED BY ZEROMITE (THE DUST MITE EXPERTS!). FINALLY EVERY DUVET IS DOUBLE-STITCHED AND PIPED AROUND THE OUTER EDGES. WHY CHOOSE THE SNOW WHITE GOOSE DOWN DUVET? WE VE STUFFED THESE DUVETS WITH 80% SNOW WHITE GOOSE DOWN AND 20% FEATHER. THE FEATHER ADDS A LITTLE BULK AND WEIGHT MAKING A SNUGGER DUVET WITH A MORE DEFINITIVE DRAPE. THEY RE CASED IN 100% COTTON (WITH A 240 THREAD COUNT) FOR A REALLY LUXURIOUS FINISHING TOUCH. SLIGHTLY HEAVIER THAN THE SUPREME AND ULTIMATE DUVETS THIS ONE S IDEAL FOR COOLER NIGHTS AND WRIGGLY SLEEPERS. A NOTE ABOUT CHOOSING TOG WEIGHT... THE TOG INDICATES HOW MUCH BODY HEAT WILL BE RETAINED BY THE DUVET DEPENDING HOW COSY YOU WANT TO BE. 4.5 TOG IS A LIGHTER DUVET FOR SUMMER.

title: LILYSILK OXFORD SILK STANDARD PILLOWCASE 19 MOMME CHARMEUSE PURE MULBERRY SILK PILLOW CASE COVER FABRIC DOUBLE-SIDE IVORY 50X75 CM
pd: A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH IS HELPFUL TO NOURISH AND PROTECT THE HAIR. THE AMINO ACIDS CONTAINED IN SILK ARE ABLE TO DELAY SKIN AGING REJUVENATING YOU THROUGHOUT THE NIGHT AND KEEP YOU LOOKING YOUNG.      DIFFERENCE BETWEEN HOUSEWIFE PILLOWCASES & OXFORD PILLOWCASES    HOUSEWIFE PILLOWCASES ARE DESIGNED WITH NO FLANGES. OXFORD PILLOWCASES ARE DESIGNED WITH FLANGES.      SILK FABRIC : 19 MOMME; 22 MOMME; 25 MOMME.   MOMMES (MM) IS A UNIT TRADITIONALLY USED TO MEASURE THE QUALITY OF SILK FABRICS. ONE MOMME = 4.340 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER; 8 MOMMES IS APPROXIMATELY 1 OUNCE PER SQUARE YARD OR 35 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER.     FOR BEDDING THE HIGHER THE WEIGHT IN MOMME THE BETTER THE SILK BEDDING IS. SHEETS BETWEEN 19-25 MOMME ARE CONSIDERED IDEAL SILK WITH MOMME WEIGHT. LOWER THAN 19 ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF QUALITY SILK BEDDING LINEN.      SILK BENEFITS :   1. TOTALLY CLEAN! - ALL OTHER TYPES OF BEDDING CONTAIN THOUSANDS OR EVEN MILLIONS OF DUST MITES MOULD FUNGUS AND OTHER MICROSCOPIC LIFE. THESE CANNOT LIVE IN SILK.   2. PROTECTS SKIN FROM FURTHER DAMAGE - A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH LEAVES A PROTECTIVE BARRIER ON SKIN HELPING PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE.   3. NOURISHES AND PROTECTS THE HAIR - IN THE SAME WAY THAT THE SKIN IS NOURISHED AND PROTECTED THE AMINO ACIDS AND THE PROTEIN SERICIN NOURISH AND PROTECT YOUR HAIR TOO.      CARE INSTRUCTION :   THE BEST WAY TO CARE FOR SILK IS SIMPLY AVOID CONTACT WITH CHEMICALS ESPECIALLY THOSE WITH STRONG BASIC/ACIDIC PROPERTIES SUCH AS BLEACH AND AVOID EXTREME TEMPERATURES ESPECIALLY HEAT.ALWAYS WASH YOUR LINEN IN LUKEWARM WATER AT APPROXIMATELY 30 DEGREES CELSIUS. IF YOU USE A WASHING MACHINE MAKE SURE TO USE A SILK OR DELICATE SETTING WITH MINIMAL SPIN TIME.

title: LILYSILK HOUSEWIFE SILK PILLOWCASE PILLOW COVER FOR HAIR AND SKIN BOTH SIDES 1PC 19 MOMME MULBERRY SILK CHARMEUSE STANDARD 50X75 CM BLUE
pd: LILYSILK S 19 MOMME PILLOWCASE IS THE PERFECT CHOICE TO ENTER THE WORLD OF SILK.INEXPENSIVE YET EFFECTIVE IN TREATING COMMON SLEEP-RELATED FACIAL/HAIR PROBLEMS.     SILK FABRIC : 19 MOMME; 22 MOMME; 25 MOMME.   MOMMES (MM) IS A UNIT TRADITIONALLY USED TO MEASURE THE QUALITY OF SILK FABRICS. ONE MOMME = 4.340 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER; 8 MOMMES IS APPROXIMATELY 1 OUNCE PER SQUARE YARD OR 35 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER.     FOR BEDDING THE HIGHER THE WEIGHT IN MOMME THE BETTER THE SILK BEDDING IS. SHEETS BETWEEN 19-25 MOMME ARE CONSIDERED IDEAL SILK WITH MOMME WEIGHT. LOWER THAN 19 ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF QUALITY SILK BEDDING LINEN.      SILK BENEFITS :   1. TOTALLY CLEAN! - ALL OTHER TYPES OF BEDDING CONTAIN THOUSANDS OR EVEN MILLIONS OF DUST MITES MOULD FUNGUS AND OTHER MICROSCOPIC LIFE. THESE CANNOT LIVE IN SILK.   2. PROTECTS SKIN FROM FURTHER DAMAGE - A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH LEAVES A PROTECTIVE BARRIER ON SKIN HELPING PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE.   3. NOURISHES AND PROTECTS THE HAIR - IN THE SAME WAY THAT THE SKIN IS NOURISHED AND PROTECTED THE AMINO ACIDS AND THE PROTEIN SERICIN NOURISH AND PROTECT YOUR HAIR TOO.      CARE INSTRUCTION :   THE BEST WAY TO CARE FOR SILK IS SIMPLY AVOID CONTACT WITH CHEMICALS ESPECIALLY THOSE WITH STRONG BASIC/ACIDIC PROPERTIES SUCH AS BLEACH AND AVOID EXTREME TEMPERATURES ESPECIALLY HEAT.ALWAYS WASH YOUR LINEN IN LUKEWARM WATER AT APPROXIMATELY 30 DEGREES CELSIUS. IF YOU USE A WASHING MACHINE MAKE SURE TO USE A SILK OR DELICATE SETTING WITH MINIMAL SPIN TIME.

title: HOMESCAPESÂ -Â DUVET

title: HOMESCAPES - LUXURY WHITE GOOSE FEATHER & DOWN 10.5 TOG SINGLE DUVET - 100% COTTON ANTI DUST MITE & DOWN PROOF FABRIC - ANTI ALLERGEN - WASHABLE AT HOME WINTER QUILT
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS AND ALSO THE QUALITY RETAILERS IN THE UK AND ELSEWHERE. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS MANUFACTURED BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN ONE OF THE LARGEST FACTORY OF THE NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR THE LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK LIKE JOHN LEWIS OR HOUSE OF FRASER. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICRO FIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.

pd: WHY MULBERRY SILK      1. FEWER WRINKLES:     MULBERRY SILK IS HYPOALLERGENIC AND CAN HELP SKIN MAINTAIN MOISTURE IT NEVER ABSORBS FACIAL CREAMS AND IT IS SUPER SMOOTH AND SOFT TO PREVENT WRINKLES.      2. PREVENT HAIR LOSS:     MULBERRY SILK FIBERS STRUCTURE IS VERY SIMILAR TO HUMAN HAIR SO THAT IT ALLOWS HAIR TO SLIDE GENTLY ACROSS THE PILLOWCASE TO PREVENT HAIR LOSS.      3. LONGER-LASTING HAIRSTYLE:    MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASES ARE SUPER SOFT AND SMOOTH THEY CAN LONGER LASTING BLOW DRIES BEST FOR THOSE WHO HAVE LONG HAIR.      4.PROMOTE HEALTH & GREAT SLEEP:     MULBERRY SILK HAS 18 TYPES OF NATURALLY OCCURRING COMPOUNDS THAT ARE BELIEVED TO PROMOTE POSITIVE HEALTH CARE FUNCTIONS. SILK IS A NATURAL BODY TEMPERATURE REGULATOR. THAT S WHY SILK IS MUCH BETTER THAN SATIN.        SILK CARE      1.COOL WASH     ALWAYS WASH YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE IN WARM NOT HOT WATER SETTING MACHINE WASHES AT 30 DEGREES OR ON A SILK SETTING.      2.USE OF PROTECTIVE BAGS    IF MACHINE WASHING TRY TO PLACE THE ITEM IN A PROTECTIVE BAG TO PREVENT THE PULLING ACTION OF YOUR WASHING MACHINE.      3.DRYING     HANGING YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE ON A WASHING LINE IS PREFERABLE TO MACHINE DRYING AWAY FROM DIRECT SUNLIGHT AND RADIATORS. WE RECOMMEND NOT TUMBLING DRY.      4.IRONING     TRY TO IRON YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE WHEN SLIGHTLY DAMP AND USE A COOL SETTING. YOUR ITEM SHOULD BE IRONED ON THE INSIDE AT ALL TIMES.      5.NEVER BLEACH     OR USE ANY KIND OF BLEACHING AGENT. BLEACH DAMAGES THE SILK FIBER AND WILL DESTROY SILK PILLOWCASE.      6.NEVER SHAMPOO     DO NOT ATTEMPT TO SUBSTITUTE A WASHING AGENT FOR SHAMPOO.

title: HOMESCAPES - ULTRASOFT SUPER MICROFIBRE - 10.5 TOG - KING SIZE - THE BEST SYNTHETIC DUVETS DESIGNED FOR AND USED BY THE BEST 5 AND 7 STAR HOTELS FROM AROUND THE WORLD - ANTI ALLERGY - ANTI DUSTMITE - BOX BAFFEL CONSTRUCTION - WASHABLE AT HOME
pd: HOMESCAPES SPECIALISES IN HIGH QUALITY FILLED PRODUCTS. THEIR DUVETS AND PILLOWS CAN BE FOUND IN LEADING HOTEL GROUPS. ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS SOLD BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN THE FACTORY OF ONE OF THE LARGEST MANUFACTURERS OF NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK. THE BASIC REASONS OF THIS CLAIM RESTS ON USE OF GOOD FABRIC AN EXCELLENT TREATMENT OF THE FILLING AND DUE CARE AND ATTENTION IN THE STITCHING AND FILLING OF THE DUVETS. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. THE FEATHERS ARE TREATED TO THE EUROPEAN OEKOTEX STANDARD AT A VERY HIGH TEMPERATURE AND EACH SHIPMENT IS ACCOMPANIED WITH THE QUALITY CERTIFICATION OF A PROPER TREATMENT. THIS KILLS ALL THE DUST MITES AND MAKES THESE FEATHERS CLEANER AND HEALTHIER THAN ANY ALTERNATIVE. DUE CARE IS THEN TAKEN WHILE MANUFACTURING THESE DUVETS; ALL THE EDGES ARE ALWAYS STITCHED WITH A TWIN NEEDLE SEWING MACHINE SO THE FEATHERS CANT SQUEEZE OUT . DUVETS ARE STITCHED IN CONTINENTAL STYLE WITH A BOX BAFFLE STITCH WHICH MEANS EACH SECTION IS SEPARATED WITH A WALL. THIS MAKES HOMESCAPES DUVETS LOFTIER WARMER AND AN ULTIMATE SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.BESIDES THE NATURAL DUVETS HOMESCAPES SPECIALIZES IN HIGH GRADE DOWN LIKE ALTERNATIVE TO NATURAL DOWN FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT PREFER A NATURAL DUVET. HOMESAPES SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS AND PILLOWS HAVE ALL THE PROPERTIES OF NATURAL GOOSE DOWN AND IS A TRULY WORLD CLASS LUXURY SLEEPING EXPERIENCE.
bp: ULTRASOFT SUPER MICROFIBRE 10.5 TOG . THIS DUVET IS NOT MADE FROM THE MUCH CHEAPER HOLLOW FIBRE FOUND IN MOST SYNTHETIC DUVETS;HOMESCAPES ULTRASOFT SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS ARE STITCHED USING BOX BAFFLE CONSTRUCTION WHICH ENSURES AN EVEN SPREAD OF FILLING AND PREVENTS CLUMPING AND COLD SPOTS THROUGHOUT THE LIFE OF THE DUVET. THE EDGES ARE ALSO DOUBLE STITCHED TO ENSURE THAT NONE OF THE FILLING IS ABLE TO ESCAPE.;HOMESCAPES ULTRASOFT SUPER MICROFIBRE DUVETS WERE ORIGINALLY DESIGNED AS A REPLACEMENT FOR 100% DOWN DUVETS AS USED BY 5 STAR HOTELS. THE END RESULT IS A DUVET THAT IS SUPER LIGHT EXTREMELY SOFT TO TOUCH AND VERY CUDDLY.;HOMESCAPES KEEP THE MANUFACTURING PROCESS A CLOSELY GUARDED SECRET AND DO NOT SUPPLY THIS QUALITY TO ANY OTHER RETAILER IN THE UK.;THE HIGH DENSITY ANTI DUST MITE ULTRASOFT MICROFIBRE COVER PROVIDES EXCELLENT PROTECTION FOR ANYBODY WHO SUFFERS WITH DUST ALLERGIES OR ASTHMA. SLEEP IN REAL LUXURY AT A FRACTION OF THE COST OF GOOSE DOWN BUT STILL GIVING ALL THE BENEFITS.

title: LILYSILK HOUSEWIFE SILK PILLOWCASE PILLOW COVER FOR HAIR AND SKIN BOTH SIDES 1PC 19 MOMME MULBERRY SILK CHARMEUSE STANDARD 50X75 CM IVORY
pd: LILYSILK S 19 MOMME PILLOWCASE IS THE PERFECT CHOICE TO ENTER THE WORLD OF SILK.INEXPENSIVE YET EFFECTIVE IN TREATING COMMON SLEEP-RELATED FACIAL/HAIR PROBLEMS.     SILK FABRIC : 19 MOMME; 22 MOMME; 25 MOMME.   MOMMES (MM) IS A UNIT TRADITIONALLY USED TO MEASURE THE QUALITY OF SILK FABRICS. ONE MOMME = 4.340 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER; 8 MOMMES IS APPROXIMATELY 1 OUNCE PER SQUARE YARD OR 35 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER.     FOR BEDDING THE HIGHER THE WEIGHT IN MOMME THE BETTER THE SILK BEDDING IS. SHEETS BETWEEN 19-25 MOMME ARE CONSIDERED IDEAL SILK WITH MOMME WEIGHT. LOWER THAN 19 ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF QUALITY SILK BEDDING LINEN.      SILK BENEFITS :   1. TOTALLY CLEAN! - ALL OTHER TYPES OF BEDDING CONTAIN THOUSANDS OR EVEN MILLIONS OF DUST MITES MOULD FUNGUS AND OTHER MICROSCOPIC LIFE. THESE CANNOT LIVE IN SILK.   2. PROTECTS SKIN FROM FURTHER DAMAGE - A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH LEAVES A PROTECTIVE BARRIER ON SKIN HELPING PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE.   3. NOURISHES AND PROTECTS THE HAIR - IN THE SAME WAY THAT THE SKIN IS NOURISHED AND PROTECTED THE AMINO ACIDS AND THE PROTEIN SERICIN NOURISH AND PROTECT YOUR HAIR TOO.      CARE INSTRUCTION :   THE BEST WAY TO CARE FOR SILK IS SIMPLY AVOID CONTACT WITH CHEMICALS ESPECIALLY THOSE WITH STRONG BASIC/ACIDIC PROPERTIES SUCH AS BLEACH AND AVOID EXTREME TEMPERATURES ESPECIALLY HEAT.ALWAYS WASH YOUR LINEN IN LUKEWARM WATER AT APPROXIMATELY 30 DEGREES CELSIUS. IF YOU USE A WASHING MACHINE MAKE SURE TO USE A SILK OR DELICATE SETTING WITH MINIMAL SPIN TIME.

title: LILYSILK 100 PURE MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASE COVER FOR HAIR WITH COTTON UNDERSIDE CHARMEUSE HYPOALLERGENIC 1PC WHITE STANDARD 40X80 CM 19 MOMME GIFT BOX
pd: LILYSILK NEW DESIGNED 19 MOMME SILK PILLOWCASE IS CRAFTED BY 100% PURE MULBERRY SILK FOR THE TOP SIDE. IT IS DESIGNED WITH A COTTON UNDERSIDE TO PREVENT SLIPPING.      SILK FABRIC : 19 MOMME; 22 MOMME; 25 MOMME.   MOMMES (MM) IS A UNIT TRADITIONALLY USED TO MEASURE THE QUALITY OF SILK FABRICS. ONE MOMME = 4.340 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER; 8 MOMMES IS APPROXIMATELY 1 OUNCE PER SQUARE YARD OR 35 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER.     FOR BEDDING THE HIGHER THE WEIGHT IN MOMME THE BETTER THE SILK BEDDING IS. SHEETS BETWEEN 19-25 MOMME ARE CONSIDERED IDEAL SILK WITH MOMME WEIGHT. LOWER THAN 19 ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF QUALITY SILK BEDDING LINEN.      SILK BENEFITS :   1. TOTALLY CLEAN! - ALL OTHER TYPES OF BEDDING CONTAIN THOUSANDS OR EVEN MILLIONS OF DUST MITES MOULD FUNGUS AND OTHER MICROSCOPIC LIFE. THESE CANNOT LIVE IN SILK.   2. PROTECTS SKIN FROM FURTHER DAMAGE - A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH LEAVES A PROTECTIVE BARRIER ON SKIN HELPING PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE.   3. NOURISHES AND PROTECTS THE HAIR - IN THE SAME WAY THAT THE SKIN IS NOURISHED AND PROTECTED THE AMINO ACIDS AND THE PROTEIN SERICIN NOURISH AND PROTECT YOUR HAIR TOO.      CARE INSTRUCTION :    *HAND WASH RECOMMENDED FIRSTLY.   *MACHINE WASH COLD GENTLE CYCLE. DO NOT BLEACH.  *USE NEUTRAL OR SPECIAL DETERGENT FOR SILK     DIFFERENCE BETWEEN SILK AND SATIN  1. SILK IS A TYPE OF FABRIC WHILE SATIN IS A WEAVE LOW PRICES SATIN ARE *NOT* MADE WITH SILK BUT WITH POLYESTER INSTEAD. A POLYESTER SATIN PILLOWCASE COSTS ROUGHLY 1/4 TO 1/2 OF A SILK PILLOWCASE OF THE SAME SIZE  2. SILK IS A NATURALLY MADE ANIMAL PROTEIN FIBER WHEREAS POLYESTER IS A INDUSTRIALLY PRODUCED FIBER MADE FROM PETROLEUM  3. SILK OFFERS SIGNIFICANTLY BETTER AFFINITY TO SKIN DUE TO SIMILAR CHEMICAL COMPOSITION. COMPARED TO SILK S SMOOTH AND LIGHT FEEL ON THE SKIN POLYESTER IS HARD BRITTLE AND NOT VERY BREATHING AT ALL
bp: THE PILLOWCASE ONE SIDE WITH 100% 19 MOMME MULBERRY SILK A SENSUOUSLY SMOOTH HYPOALLERGENIC AND BREATHABLE NATURAL ORGANIC FIBER; ANOTHER SIDE IS 100% COTTON TO PREVENT SLIPPING;ANTI-AGEING & HAIR FRIZZ - SUPERB ANTI WRINKLE SKIN CARE PRODUCT WHICH STOP YOUR FACE AND HAIR FROM DRYING OUT.;HIDDEN ZIPPER CLOSURE AT THE SIDE TO PREVENT SLIPPING. AND FOR STYLE COMFORT AND BETTER FIT.;OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 CERTIFIED TO BE FREE OF CHEMICALS AND NATURALLY DYED WITH NO COLOR SHADING OR FADING.;EASY CARE:HAND OR MACHINE WASH IN COLD WATER ON GENTLE CYCLE. THESE SIBERIAN GOOSE DOWN DUVETS OFFER COSY AND ABSOLUTLY SUPERB SLEEPING COMFORT FOR THOSE WHO VALUE A GOOD SLEEP.

ALL DUVETS AND PILLOWS MANUFACTURED BY HOMESCAPES ARE PRODUCED IN ONE OF THE LARGEST FACTORY OF THE NATURAL PILLOWS AND DUVETS. THIS FACTORY IS ALSO MANUFACTURING FOR THE LEADING DEPARTMENT STORES AND HIGH STREET NAMES IN THE UK. SO IN EFFECT A HOMESCAPES DUVET AND PILLOW IS AT LEAST AS GOOD AS THE ONES AVAILABLE IN MOST RESPECTED DEPARTMENT STORES IN THE UK LIKE JOHN LEWIS OR HOUSE OF FRASER. ALL FABRICS ARE IN A VERY HIGH THREAD COUNT MINIMUM BEING 233 TC TREATED FOR BEING DOWN PROOF AND RIGOROUSLY TESTED FOR THEIR PERFORMANCE. title: 100% HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN DUVET - SINGLE - 10.5 TOG
pd: WHY CHOOSE HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN?      THE CLUSTERS OF DOWN FROM HUNGARIAN GEESE HAVE LONGER FILAMENTS MAKING EACH CLUSTER GREATER IN VOLUME THAN THE DOWN FROM OTHER GEESE.  WE THEREFORE NEED LESS DOWN TO GET THE SAME WARMTH RETENTION IN THE DUVET RESULTING IN THE HUNGARIAN DUVETS BEING LIGHTER.  ADDITIONALLY THE QUALITY OF THE DOWN IS BETTER ENSURING THE DUVET REMAINS PLUMP AND FILLED FOR LONGER.        CONSTRUCTION:      THESE DUVETS ARE STITCHED WITH A BAFFLE BOX CONSTRUCTION. SQUARE BOXES ARE SEPARATED BY A SERIES OF 1  INTERNAL FABRIC WALLS.  THESE WALLS PERMIT THE DUVET TO EXPAND SO THAT THE DOWN CAN REACH ITS MAXIMUM LOFT ALLOWING EVEN DISTRIBUTION WHILE STILL HOLDING THE DOWN SECURELY IN PLACE.  EACH BOX IS INDIVIDUALLY FILLED WITH THE EXACT AMOUNT OF DOWN REQUIRED AND FINISHED WITH DOUBLE STITCHING AND PIPED EDGING.     THE FILLING IS 100% HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN. THE CASING IS A LOVELY JAQUARD 100% COTTON.  WITH A 300 HIGH THREAD COUNT FOR SUPERIOR STRENGTH AND A SOFT DELICATE FINISH IT IS CUSTOM MADE FOR PURE DOWN.        100 % HUNGARIAN GOOSE DOWN   600 FILL POWER   1   INCH INTERNAL FABRIC WALLS   CASING JAQUARD 100% COTTON   BAFFLE BOX CONSTRUCTION   MACHINE WASHABLE   15 YEAR GUARANTEE   CERTIFIED BY OEKO-TEX 100   DOUBLE STITCHING AND PIPING   COMES WITH A LOVELY RE-USABLE BAG

pd: LILYSILK S 19 MOMME PILLOWCASE IS THE PERFECT CHOICE TO ENTER THE WORLD OF SILK.INEXPENSIVE YET EFFECTIVE IN TREATING COMMON SLEEP-RELATED FACIAL/HAIR PROBLEMS.     SILK FABRIC : 19 MOMME; 22 MOMME; 25 MOMME.   MOMMES (MM) IS A UNIT TRADITIONALLY USED TO MEASURE THE QUALITY OF SILK FABRICS. ONE MOMME = 4.340 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER; 8 MOMMES IS APPROXIMATELY 1 OUNCE PER SQUARE YARD OR 35 GRAMS PER SQUARE METER.     FOR BEDDING THE HIGHER THE WEIGHT IN MOMME THE BETTER THE SILK BEDDING IS. SHEETS BETWEEN 19-25 MOMME ARE CONSIDERED IDEAL SILK WITH MOMME WEIGHT. LOWER THAN 19 ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF QUALITY SILK BEDDING LINEN.      SILK BENEFITS :   1. TOTALLY CLEAN! - ALL OTHER TYPES OF BEDDING CONTAIN THOUSANDS OR EVEN MILLIONS OF DUST MITES MOULD FUNGUS AND OTHER MICROSCOPIC LIFE. THESE CANNOT LIVE IN SILK.   2. PROTECTS SKIN FROM FURTHER DAMAGE - A NATURAL PART OF SILK IS THE PROTEIN SERICIN WHICH LEAVES A PROTECTIVE BARRIER ON SKIN HELPING PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE.   3. NOURISHES AND PROTECTS THE HAIR - IN THE SAME WAY THAT THE SKIN IS NOURISHED AND PROTECTED THE AMINO ACIDS AND THE PROTEIN SERICIN NOURISH AND PROTECT YOUR HAIR TOO.      CARE INSTRUCTION :   THE BEST WAY TO CARE FOR SILK IS SIMPLY AVOID CONTACT WITH CHEMICALS ESPECIALLY THOSE WITH STRONG BASIC/ACIDIC PROPERTIES SUCH AS BLEACH AND AVOID EXTREME TEMPERATURES ESPECIALLY HEAT.ALWAYS WASH YOUR LINEN IN LUKEWARM WATER AT APPROXIMATELY 30 DEGREES CELSIUS. IF YOU USE A WASHING MACHINE MAKE SURE TO USE A SILK OR DELICATE SETTING WITH MINIMAL SPIN TIME.

title: OOSILK 100% MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASE FOR HAIR AND SKIN 1PC STANDARD 50X75CM LIGHT BLUE
pd: WHY MULBERRY SILK   1. FEWER WRINKLES:    MULBERRY SILK IS HYPOALLERGENIC AND CAN HELP SKIN MAINTAIN MOISTURE IT NEVER ABSORB FACIAL CREAMS AND IT IS SUPER SMOOTH AND SOFT TO PREVENT WRINKLES.    2. PREVENT HAIR LOSS:    MULBERRY SILK FIBERS STRUCTURE IS VERY SIMILAR TO HUMAN HAIR SO THAT IT ALLOWS HAIR TO SLIDE GENTLY ACROSS THE PILLOWCASE TO PREVENT HAIR LOSS.     3. LONGER-LASTING HAIRSTYLE:   MULBERRY SILK PILLOWCASES ARE SUPER SOFT AND SMOOTH THEY CAN LONGER LASTING BLOW DRIES BEST FOR THOSE WHO HAVE LONG HAIR.    4.PROMOTE HEALTH & GREAT SLEEP:    MULBERRY SILK HAS 18 TYPES OF NATURALLY OCCURRING COMPOUNDS THAT ARE BELIEVED TO PROMOTE POSITIVE HEALTH CARE FUNCTIONS. SILK IS A NATURAL BODY TEMPERATURE REGULATOR. THAT S WHY SILK IS MUCH BETTER THAN SATIN.      SILK CARE    1.COOL WASH    ALWAYS WASH YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE IN WARM NOT HOT WATER SETTING MACHINE WASHES AT 30 DEGREES OR ON A SILK SETTING.     2.USE OF PROTECTIVE BAGS   IF MACHINE WASHING TRY TO PLACE THE ITEM IN A PROTECTIVE BAG TO PREVENT THE PULLING ACTION OF YOUR WASHING MACHINE.    3.DRYING    HANGING YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE ON A WASHING LINE IS PREFERABLE TO MACHINE DRYING AWAY FROM DIRECT SUNLIGHT AND RADIATORS. WE RECOMMEND NOT TUMBLING DRY.    4.IRONING    TRY TO IRON YOUR SILK PILLOWCASE WHEN SLIGHTLY DAMP AND USE A COOL SETTING. YOUR ITEM SHOULD BE IRONED ON THE INSIDE AT ALL TIMES.    5.NEVER BLEACH    OR USE ANY KIND OF BLEACHING AGENT. BLEACH DAMAGES THE SILK FIBER AND WILL DESTROY SILK PILLOWCASE.    6.NEVER SHAMPOO    DO NOT ATTEMPT TO SUBSTITUTE A WASHING AGENT FOR SHAMPOO.

title: MICROFIBRE LUXURY FEELS LIKE DOWN DOUBLE DUVET 13.5TOG
pd: MATERIAL:  MICROFIBRE    FILLING: MICROFIBRE    TOG:  13.5    COLOUR:  WHITE    PATTERN:  SOLID    SIZE:  DOUBLE      WHAT IS TOG?     DUVETS AND QUILTS WORK BY TRAPPING WARM AIR AND THE HIGHER THE TOG RATING THE MORE WARMTH THE DUVET WILL PROVIDE. THE TABLE BELOW WILL HELP YOU DECIDE WHICH TOG RATING IS RIGHT FOR YOU.      SEASON : TOG RATING     SUMMER :  4.5    SPRING :  10.5    AUTUMN :  13.5    WINTER :  15.0    ALL SEASONS :  4.5 + 9.0 OR 4.5 + 10.5       DUVET SIZE:      SINGLE :  135CM X 200CM (4FT 5  X 6FT 7 )    DOUBLE :  200CM X 200CM (6FT 7  X 6FT 7 )    KING :  230CM X 220CM (7FT 7  X 7FT 3 )    SUPER KING :  260CM X 220CM (8FT 6  X 7FT 3 )       WHAT IS MICROFIBRE?     MICROFIBRE IS A ULTRA FINE AND ULTRA SOFT FIBRE WHICH IS LIGHTWEIGHT BUT HAS HIGH THERMAL RETENTION PROPERTIES. OUR DUVETS USE PRIMALOFT MICROFIBRE WHICH WAS DEVELOPED FOR THE US ARMY AS AN ALTERNATIVE TO DOWN. THE ADVANTAGE FOR THE ARMY WAS THAT WHEN A SLEEPING BAG BECAME WET IT WOULD STILL RETAIN ITS INSULATING CAPABILITIES UNLIKE DOWN OR HOLLOW-FIBRE. NOWADAY S DUE ITS SOFT FLUFFY VELVETY TEXTURE IT IS USED IN BEDDING.   THE FILLING COMPROMISES OF 100% MICROFIBRE.THE MICROFIBRE CONTENT PROVIDES HIGH LOFT EXTRA SOFTNESS AND TRAPS WARM AIR EFFICIENTLY. THIS GIVES THE DUVET A REALLY SUMPTUOUS COZY FEEL AS IT DRAPES SOFTLY OVER THE BODY.       EASY CARE FULLY WASHABLE     QUALITY 100% MICROFIBRE COVER     BRAND NEW AND SEALED IN A PRESENTATION BAG     MANUFACTURED WITH CARE     DESIGNED TO DRAPE COMFORTABLY AND SOFTLY AROUND THE BODY

title: ROMA DUCK FEATHER AND DOWN DUVETS 10.5 TOG (SUPER KING)
pd: ROMA DUVETS ARE MADE TO BRITISH STANDARDS FOR GURANTEED WARMTH AND CLEANLINESSWARMTH CLASSIFICATIONS 4.5TOG 7.5TOG 10.5TOG 12 TOG 13.5TOG 15TOG SUMMER USE 4.5 TOGSPRING USE 10.5 TOGAUTUMN 10.5 TOGWINTER 13.5 TOG OR 15.0 TOG SHOULD I BUY MAN-MADE FIBRES OR NATURAL FILLINGS ?THIS IS A MATTER OF PERSONAL PREFERENCE; MAN-MADE CONTINENTAL QUILTS HAVE CERTAIN ADVANTAGES OVER NATURAL FILLED PRODUCTS. THEY ARE GENERALLY LESS EXPENSIVE SO MORE PEOPLE CAN ENJOY THE LUXURY OF A CONTINENTAL QUILT AT AFFORDABLE PRICES. THEY ARE ODOURLESS NON-ALLERGENIC AND ARE DUST FREE. CONTINENTAL QUILTS WITH MAN-MADE FILLINGS ARE EASY TO CARE FOR AND TO WASH.AS WITH MOST THINGS THE BETTER THE QUALITY OF MAN-MADE FILLING THE BETTER THE OVERALL PERFORMANCE OF THE QUILT. MOST MAN-MADE FILLINGS ARE MADE FROM POLYESTER FIBRES AND CAN BE SOLID OR HOLLOW WHICH TRAPS EVEN MORE AIR WITHIN AND BETWEEN EACH FIBRE. NATURAL QUILTS ARE IN GENERAL MORE COMFORTABLE AND WARMER THAN MAN-MADE QUILTS. THEY WILL DRAPE AROUND THE BODY AND BREATHE AS ONLY A NATURAL PRODUCT CAN.A COMFORTABLE SLEEPER WILL PERSPIRE AROUND ONE-THIRD TO ONE PINT OF MOISTURE A NIGHT. TO MAINTAIN DRY AND COMFORTABLE WARMTH THIS MOISTURE MUST BE TRANSPORTED AWAY FROM THE BODY. NATURAL FILLINGS ARE MORE ABSORBENT THAN MAN-MADE FILLINGS. THEY ACTUALLY ABSORB AND TRANSPORT MOISTURE THEREBY LOWERING THE HUMIDITY OF THE AIR IN THE QUILT. ONCE ABSORBED THE MOISTURE SLOWLY EVAPORATES SO COLDNESS IS NOT EXPERIENCED
